meanings.definition: Able to be defined or described.
meanings.sent1: The concept was definable in simple terms.
meanings.sent2: The definable characteristics of the animal made it easy to recognize.
meanings.sent3: It was a definable moment when the cat chased its own tail.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as definable as a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter was definable even from a distance.

meanings.definition: Capable of being clearly understood or identified.
meanings.sent1: The instructions were definable and easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The definable landmarks helped us navigate through the forest.
meanings.sent3: It was definable that the clown had a fear of balloons.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as definable as a mountain standing tall.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers was definable in the garden.
